meanings.definition: A list or plan showing when each person is required to work or take part in a particular operation.
meanings.sent1: The rosters for the project schedule were carefully organized.
meanings.sent2: The manager checked the rosters to see who was assigned to the morning shift.
meanings.sent3: The rosters for the school play had a mix-up, and the janitor ended up playing the lead role.
meanings.sent4: The rosters of duty were like a puzzle, fitting each person into the right time slot.
meanings.sent5: The rosters, like a map, guided everyone to their tasks with precision.

meanings.definition: A list of members of a sports team or organization.
meanings.sent1: The basketball coach updated the rosters with the new players' names.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly awaited the release of the team rosters for the upcoming season.
meanings.sent3: The rosters for the chess club had a surprise addition - a grandmaster's pet parrot.
meanings.sent4: The rosters of the soccer team were like a family tree, showing the connections between players.
meanings.sent5: The rosters, like a shield, displayed the strength and unity of the team.
